<class name="joint_normalization_filters/UnNormalizeFilterJointTrajectory" type="joint_normalization_filters::UnNormalizeJointTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Uses the current joint state information to unwrap continuous joints to the nearest position to the current joint state. This filter will incrementally update points in a trajectory. This filter listens for a message on the "/joint_states" topic for the current joint state.
